resources.string: There was a problem with the configuration message, so your phone settings have not been updated.
APN is empty in the configuration message received, so the phone settings have not been updated.
A new access point has been successfully installed.
Message is accessible in the Messaging app menu: Settings>Configuration messages
Tap here to configure your phone
The PIN you have entered is incorrect
The configuration message you received could not be authenticated against your SIM card, so cannot be used to configure your device.
You are about to install the following settings on your phone:
The configuration message you received did not specify any authentication, so cannot be used to configure your device
The PIN code would have been provided by the operator.
Press the buttons below to test provisioning application
Send PDUs to notification system (user pin)
Send PDUs to notification system (network pin)
Send PDUs to notification system (user network pin)
Send PDUs to notification system (user pin mac)
Do you want to delete all selected messages?
Do you want to delete all messages?
